s-1.ptxt: DISCONNECT CABLE FROM NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

atten2.ptxt: Wait at least 90 seconds after disconnecting the cable from the negative (-) battery terminal to prevent airbag activation.

s2.ptxt: Remove the drain plug and gasket, and drain the ATF.
Install a new gasket and the drain plug.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE TRANSMISSION OIL FILLER TUBE SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 bolts and oil filler tube.
Remove the O-ring from the oil filler tube.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION OIL PAN SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Remove the oil pan and oil pan gasket.
Examine the particles in the oil pan.

s3.ptxt: Remove all the magnets and use them to collect steel particles. Carefully look at the foreign matter and particles in the pan and on the magnets to determine the type of wear you will find in the transmission.
Steel (magnetic): bearing, gear and clutch plate wear

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE VALVE BODY OIL STRAINER ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Remove the 3 bolts and oil strainer.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful as some fluid will leak out of the oil strainer.

s2.ptxt: Remove the 3 gaskets from the oil strainer.
Pry out both overdrive brake tube ends with a large screwdriver and remove the overdrive brake tube.
Disconnect the 4 connectors from the 4 shift solenoid valves.
Remove the 17 bolts and valve body.
